Summary Heading: Why is the pool closed? Disappointing visit
Summary: From Santa Barbara to San Diego; from Santa Monica to Indio, when I visit Southern California, I expect the hotel pool to be open unless the outdoor temperature is below 70F degrees. The hotel's pool was inexplicably closed (no reason given), with an opening date in August. There was no shampoo in the room, and I needed to leave a note for housekeeping twice for the staff to add more. Some thugs woke me up at 1:34am talking and playing loud vulgar music right outside my room. Happily, their stay was brief. My bathroom ceiling leaked for about 10 minutes one evening. Wifi was weak and did not support video. The location is great: barely a 12-minute bus ride to Disneyland; a 90-minute bus ride to John Wayne Airport (2 busses); and a 110-minute bus ride to Newport Beach. Starbucks
Room tip: Rooms facing west might have less traffic and less noise from Harbor Boulevard.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that you didn't enjoy your stay with us, and we apologize for any inconveniences you may have experienced. We hope for the opportunity to improve your experience with us. Please visit again. Nancy Y.	 #Team6

Summary: They over booked even though I had booked and paid online. At first they said they had no rooms left. They found a room. The room was dirty. The restroom was not clean. The front desk guy came up and wiped the restroom. The carpet looks like it hasn’t been cleaned it years. It looks like a couple brothers bought the hotel and are doing the minimum to keep it going. I would never stay there again. I would not recommend this place to anyone. As I am finishing this review I realized why they over booked. (They had someone on the phone when I arrived and said they would save the room for them if they paid cash. I looked on the counter and they had a ledger with what looked like bookings and the cash amount) that is the room they gave me because I had already paid) just my guess.
Room tip: Pay a few extra dollars and stay somewhere nice.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that you didn't enjoy your stay with us, and we apologize for any inconveniences you may have experienced. We hope for the opportunity to improve your experience with us. Please visit again. Nancy Y.	 #Team6

Summary Heading: No privacy ...no matter how many times you ask .....
Summary: I should have known from the sign indicating my room number..... it was done in handwritten sharpie.  First I was way overcharged .. the price was listed at $78.... I was charged over $100 per night.  You will not be able to use the pool after 9:00 pm .. It wil be padlocked shut.  You will not be able to do laundry after 9:00 pm .. you will be locked out of the laundry room.  You will have your privacy intrupted every three days with zero warning.. I looked again and there is nothing on the policy page about rooms will be serviced every three days ( or in my case about evey other day even after numerous times asking to have no service)  Policies  "All guests registering must be at least 18 years of age and must present valid picture identification. Check-in time is at 3:00 pm.
Manager Response: Hi Kathy,, On behalf of Studio 6, we would like to apologize for the inconvenience you incurred while our guest.  We are committed to guest satisfaction and appreciate you taking time to review your experience.  Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

Summary Heading: homeless population takes over the place at nigh
Summary: the room is small and outdated, but clean. Most of the staff are friendly amd helpful but when someone parked diagonally across our trailer they couldn't do anything about it!!! they do not take make, model and licence plates of cars.  It is against their policy to tow cars so you are stuck and we were at NAMM and needed to load out that day. The hallways and stairs are loaded with homeless people at night and they can be disruptive. They provide no security guard at night or cameras.  This is not a safe area.  It is really designed to provide temporary housing to disenfranchised people.
Room tip: I have no idea, we were here fore 6 nights
Manager Response: Hi Laurie,  We appreciate you recognizing our excellent service, though it sounds like your stay might not have been as comfortable as you anticipated. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. We hope for the opportunity to improve your experience with us. Please visit again.

Summary: I have been living in this hotel for over a month now and it has been no problem what’s so ever. If you’re looking for a last minute booking or by saving money instead of spending hundreds of dollars on a room, this place is the best way to go. Small kitchen, mini fridge, microwave, they have it. If you’re a light sleeper, I wouldn’t recommend it since it is next to the freeway. Other than that, the staff here is amazing ... especially Laura! (:  If you’re too high maintenance and feel as if you’re better than anyone, this place is not for you. If you’re looking for a place to spend the night or visit, I do recommend it here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was meeting friends from Hawaii who were staying at the Anaheim Marriott, "down the street," or so I thought.  This dump is in Fullerton, not Anaheim.  The elevator is filthy.  I asked twice for them to clean my room and finally gave up.  There were large cigarette holes in the bedspread.  I've seen worse Motel 6s (e.g., overrun with prostitutes), but this is the next worse.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with our location and for your unpleasant stay due to the dissatisfaction you describe. Please know the issue you experienced is an exception to our guest commitment and as such, we apologize. The service concerns you describe are atypical to Motel 6 standards for quality, and we are sorry you experienced less than satisfying service during your visit. We encourage you to contact our Guest Relations department at 1-855-787-9864 to record the details of your visit to help us provide a better guest experience in the future.

Summary: I love the staff I love the rooms and i would recommend it here. My kids love coming here all the time we need to go get away or a visit. Belinda cool manager. House keeping lady nice. Laura nice. :).
Manager Response: Dear  Sunshine18219225434,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful review  of Studio 6 Anaheim!  We are excited to share this review with Belinda and Laura who will be pleased to hear of the outcome of their efforts to make you feel  comfortable. We look forward to having you stay with us again and earn another perfect 5 rating.

Summary Heading: Cheap hotel complete with prostitutes and stabbings
Summary: We booked this last minute after a 16 hour day at Disneyland and just needed somewhere to sleep.  We arrived to see police cars in the parking lot.  They were leaving as we checked in.  As soon they left, the ladies of the night came out of rooms to work their magic and attend to their customers.  As we walked upstairs to our “pool view” room, we noticed drops of blood all over the steps.  The room itself was run down, smelled old and moldy, and had holes in the wall.  We checked for bed bugs because the sheets looked about 10 years old.  The TV didn’t work.  The bathroom wasn’t clean.   It looked like a perfect breeding ground for cockroaches or rats.  But wait, it gets better.  We deadbolted the room, decided it was just one night, and decided to tough it out.  Until one of us
Manager Response: Emily G,  We are deeply saddened to hear that you are seeking out other  due to the lapse in service you experienced during your recent stay This issue is being addressed with our staff and management. On behalf of our entire staff, we thank you for choosing our hotel and hope you give us a chance to serve you again and will experience the improvements we have made with our service.

Summary: My husband and his friend stayed at the Studio 6 Anaheim last Friday night 11/2/18 to attend an event.  Their stay would have been fine, except that they are both now covered in bug bites that could ONLY have come from the hotel.  Obviously they will not be staying here again and we would advise ANYONE considering this place to think twice.
Manager Response: Dear Chad, Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We strive to deliver a great guest experience, but it sounds as though we did not perform to our usual standards in this case. We have procedures in place related to our pest policy that should have prevented the inconveniences you describe. Please accept our apologies that your stay was less than satisfactory. We encourage you to contact Guest Services at 1-855-787-9864  to record the details of your visit to help us provide a better guest experience in the future.

Summary: Laura had great costumer service.  I'm most likely come back because of her service. Hope to see Laura again. Room was clean for my family at an affordable price. On a scale of 1-10 it an 8.5 that we will come back.
Manager Response: Jasmin R,  Thank you for taking the time to share this five star experience with our management, staff, and future guests. I'm glad that our services, hospitality, and accommodations exceeded your expectations and hope that you experience the same comfortable stay during your next visit! We will happily share your comments with  Laura and we look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: You can pay the same price for a room that has less, or you can pay for better amenities! This room had a kitchen not just a typical microwave. There was a stove, fridge & freezer, sink for washing dishes (deeper than a bathroom sink), and the standard microwave. Comfortable bed, free wifi (while most places make you pay an additional fee for wifi access), a pool in which to enjoy a dip of coolness amidst the heat wave, and working air conditioning to keep the room comfortable.  The staff are also super friendly and offer great customer service.  Quite possibly the only thing that chould make it better is a simple set of pots & pans to be able to cook in the room, and the usual hygiene items (body wash, shampoo & conditioner) that travelers sometimes forget.   I would definitely
Manager Response: Traci W,  Thank you very much for the compliments you give to our hotel! We value our customer's experience that is why we always make sure that our facilities are in good shape to provide our customers the best we can offer in a reasonable price. We can't begin to tell you how much we appreciate your five star review, and we can't wait to serve you again!

Summary: Nice, clean and great staff The rooms maybe a big simple, but very convenient. Between Anaheim and Fullerton this is the place to stay The Starbucks on the other side of the road is also very convenient for breakfast
Manager Response: lekkerjeroen,  Thank you for sharing your perspective of our hotel’s accommodations and services! I am so glad that you found our hotel to be clean and convenient and that you enjoyed the five star accommodations and hospitality that we strive to show to each guest, during every stay. It is great to hear that you enjoyed the value, as well; and we are looking forward to your next visit to the area!

Summary: We just stay one night and we didn't have any problems. The staff was really friendly, and the room  and facilities were great. As a plus, the motel is really close to downtown. We will probably stay here again!
Manager Response: nvw223,  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to recognize our staff for their exemplary work in providing a comfortable and convenient experience for our valued guests. It is rewarding to hear that we have succeeded in making you feel at home and that you experienced no difficulties with our services or amenities.  We're glad you had a good time with us and Our team will be waiting for your next return for another well-deserved break.

Summary: The absolute worst hotel experience I have ever had. My family and I stayed here for 4 nights after Christmas Dec 2017. Every single night we came back our keys didn't work, had to go to the office every night for them to reprogram our keys. Also every single night (once we got inside) we discovered our smoke alarm to be beeping; that slow beep that means change the batteries etc. The first night it was beeping at 11:30 pm while I'm trying to get my kids to stay asleep! I called the front office and they said it would take 30 minutes for someone to come fix it! 30 minutes of constant beeping in the middle of the night?! You've got to be kidding me. Each night after I called about the beeping smoke detector they would just tell me to remove the detector since they "can't" fix it.
Manager Response: We have high standards of hospitality and service and we strive to give you the best experience at the best value. Thank you so much for the insight regarding our bed and front desk. We hope you will return to see how we are continuously improving in an effort to impress our valued guests.

Summary: We were not in the motel for a very long time, so our review is limited in scope to what we observed and did there.  I do not have anything bad to say about the room or the facilities.  Overall it met our requirements.
Manager Response: Galen P,  Thank you so much for staying at the  Studio 6 Hotel. It is rewarding to hear that we have succeeded in making you feel at home and that you experienced no difficulties with our services or amenities. We're glad you had a great time with us and we look forward to serving you again.

Summary: Checked in on 10/20 and spent 10 min trying to get the keys to work. Had to be re-programmed. Went back to room and got in fine. I went out for a few hours and came back and could not get into room again! Had the lady at the front desk try and she couldn't get it to open either. Had to call maintenance guy at his house and waited in the lobby for 45 min. He got there and got it open right away, but all told, I spent and hour locked out of my room. When I told the manager about this at checkout, she offered no apology and offered a whopping $5 off for my trouble. She pushed a few buttons and said it would be refunded on my card. 11 days later, still no credit. She obviously just lied to get me outta there. While I was in complaining, there was another lady doing the same thing
Manager Response: Ken M,  Thank you for letting us know about the inconveniences that you encountered during your recent stay at our hotel. It is our highest ambition to provide the best lodging experience to our valued guests and your voice is important to us.  Your comments will be shared with the hotel management for improvements and we hope you will give us the chance to welcome you back so we may ensure your visit is nothing short of excellent.

Summary: We stayed 3 nights at this hotel Honestly it is clean, safe, and close to downtown. The staff is super friendly. The only thing I didn’t like in this motel was that the didn’t provide Shampoo  Anything else is okay  Best
Manager Response: Hassan A,  Thank you for taking the time to complete our guest satisfaction survey and for rating our hotel so highly! I am so glad that you found our hotel to be clean and convenient and that you enjoyed the accommodations and hospitality that we strive to show to each guest, during every stay. We are glad your stay was comfortable and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Pictures of this place on the website is a total opposite of what it is. We reserved for two rooms and arrived past 4pm. The rooms weren't ready and when one room was ready we agreed to put all our luggages in there until the second were to ready. The room odor was musty and moldy. Since we had appointments to go to we requested to have an ionizer in the rooms so it will be better when we got back which was late in the evening (midnite) When we return we got the room, however it was different from what we were told earlier in the day. Three doors further which was okay however the bathroom floor was all flooded  due to a leak from above which obviously was never reported. We were given another room, this time it was the room they had mention to us earlier in the day. As we
Manager Response: Fely G,  Please accept our sincerest apologies for the housekeeping issues that you encountered during your stay in our hotel. I am so sorry that you smelled of mold, urine in your room and you were not satisfied with the condition and cleanliness of the hotel your guest room at that time. This is certainly not the kind of experience we would like for our valued guests to have. We thank you for bringing these matters to our attention with constructive criticism and we hope you'll return someday to enjoy a five star experience.

Summary: Room was spacious and clean, however this was a solo trip with my 7 year old daughter. While staying at Studio 6 a lot of suspicious activity was happening, in and around the hotel. Men (and a woman) were walking around the hotel communicating and talking about drugs and meeting people at the nearby park. How I know this? Well they were talking about their business right outside my door. I did not feel safe at all. Our door looked like it had been kicked down more than once. Will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Aster G,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review and share your experience. I am pleased to learn that we were able to meet your expectations in cleanliness , though  I regret to hear that you weren't thoroughly impressed with the surrounding environment. Rest assured that there will be no harm that will come to our guests as we ensure strict security for everyone's safety. I hope that this will not deter you from enjoying our accommodations and services in the future.

Summary: The room was not clean enough for my wife and I we like the area. Hotel needs to spend more time on cleaning and getting the rooms ready  The front desk was very understanding and had no problem with the  refund
Manager Response: aurelio m,  Thank you for sharing your experience, and  I apologize if you did not feel that our housekeeping met your own standards of cleanliness, though our own standards are very high and include checking up to ensure that rooms are as clean as can be. We want you to experience the best value for your money, to feel comfortable, and to have your expectations exceeded; I hope that this will be the case during your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Not bad for the price. But very bad neighborhood.
Summary: We stayed at this place before and honestly it was one of the worst places we had stayed. It is still a bad neighborhood and people who live in this motel are not afraid to let trash and alcohol and themselves run wild in the motel. There is not respect by the inhabitants.  We went was running late to check in. The man this round who check us in was very nice and a relief to talk to after a long day. The man gave us a nice king sized room and it was clean. There was minimal parking. The outside of the building was pretty dirty. You close your door and the whole outside of the building feels like it wants to come off. We did not do the breakfast. So I don’t know now if it had changed. But I wish I had more to say.
Manager Response: Amanda J,  Your review and rating of our hotel mean a lot to us, and we thank you for taking the time to share this experience. I am glad that our staff was accommodating, though I do apologize for any inconvenience or difficulty that you experienced and I hope it will not deter you from experiencing our improvements and updated policies in the future.

Summary: Disgusting!! Rooms are very dirty. Smell like urine. Most things broken and in need of an update. Very awful customer service . Yesenia front desk clerk very rude. I asked for towels due to the fact we had 2 in each room. Rolled her eyes at me and asked if i didnt have any in my room. Told her i only had 2. Said she could not give me any because she did not know where the cleaning lady was. Did not even bother contacting her. Disappointed! Will never stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the housekeeping issues that you encountered during your stay in our hotel.  Also, we are sorry for the disappointing service you received from our staff at that time. Our team is working hard to make sure our guests are comfortable and are receiving the best service. Your feedback will be forwarded to the hotel management to ensure that situation like this will not happen again in the future.

Summary: If you're looking for a hotel under $80 not to far from the tourist attractions this former comfort inn / quality inn is the spot.  Pros 1.) easy parking  2.) personal wifi login (more secure) 3.) ownership on site and friendly  4.) price 5.) let me say it again, price  6.) was safe  7.) kitchen  Cons 1.) it's feels a little unsafe but you will get over it. 2.) the room a/c made vibration sounds  3.) the sheets didn't look the cleanest  4.) the walls could use fresh paint  5.) on of the overhead bed lamps didn't work
Manager Response: Dear  JimDeBerry,  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to recognize our staff for their exemplary work in providing clean and comfortable experience for our valued guests. Our staff is highly trained to give you an exceptional experience, and to provide our customers the best we can offer in a reasonable price. I am glad that we were able to meet your expectations of service and accommodations and we're all looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: My dog didn't even like it
Summary: Listed as "Newly Opened" - actually just a new owner. The photo looks great, but in real life, the property is old and looks it. Wooden railings are rotted and painted over, and exterior breezeways slant down and out at an alarming angle.  There were two clerks at the desk when I checked in, one of whom did not seem to speak or understand English, know how to use the reservation system, or how to treat customers. Of course, she was not wearing a name tag, unlike the other clerk.  I actually heard her tell a customer on the phone to call back in 2 days to talk to the manager because she didn't know how to process his deposit refund. The room did seem to be clean, with a microwave, fridge, flat panel TV, desk, adequate lighting, a desk chair, and an easy chair. As with most Motel
Manager Response: Dear  fancypawz,  Thank you for sharing your experience, and I am so sorry to learn that we failed to meet your expectations of quality service and accommodations. I apologize if you did not feel that our housekeeping met your own standards of cleanliness, though our own standards are very high and include checking up to ensure that rooms are as clean as can be. Your feedback will serve as encouragement to all of our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services to provide an exceptional experience for you and other guests in the future

Summary Heading: See Quality Inn review. The worst place ever!!
Summary: As stated on Quality Inn review (this hotel changed from Quality Inn to Studio 6 in March)  Avoid this hotel at all costs!!  Dirty hotel, dirty towels and sheets and no soap! The staff and management are rude and unhelpful.
Manager Response: Dear  huddo2404,  Thank you for sharing the details about your recent visit. I'm sorry to hear that your most recent stay with us did not meet your expectations of quality service, accommodations and hospitality. We are working to address all of the issues that you mentioned and we thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  Hope that you will someday return to be impressed by the changes we've made.

Summary: This is a Studio 6 Motel (part of the Motel 6 chain).  It was formerly a Quality Inn and it has undergone recent renovation.  It is on N Harbor Blvd and adjacent to a major freeway, so we were concerned about noise.  Upon our request for a quiet room, we were given a room on the third floor, towards the back, facing a pre-school next door.  Room was quiet.  Room came with a microwave, refrigerator, flatscreen TV, free WIFI, granite countertop, lamps with plug ins and usb ports that could be used to recharge phones, landline phone, alarm clock, desk chair, and other cushioned chair.  Beds only came with a single top sheet.  No blanket or bedspread on either bed.  Mattress and bedding seemed fine, but lack of covers was uncomfortable.   Inside of dresser was dirty.  A/C smelled of
Manager Response: Dear familyoffour1111,  Thank you for sharing your experience, and I am so sorry to learn that we failed to meet your expectations of quality service and accommodations.  We take all reports of lacking service and your suggestions for improvement, particularly those that you have raised. We greatly appreciate your time in bringing a number of important matters to light and we hope that you will find your expectations to be far surpassed during your next stay with us. Kind regards.
